question.text: You are reversing around a corner when you notice a pedestrian walking behind you. What should you do?

explanation.text: Wait until the pedestrian has passed, then look around again before you start to reverse. Don’t forget that you may not be able to see a small child directly behind your vehicle. Be aware of the possibility of hidden dangers.

answer.text: Slow down and wave the pedestrian across
Continue reversing and steer round the pedestrian
Continue reversing and sound your horn
